body.p: Duck hunting pretty good and most people that go hunting get ducks first day. This week I want to tell white people about good job I have one time and all time 1926 work for Minnehaha Arrowhead Hosiery company and travel all over everywhere and go to Kenosha, Superior, Racine and I can’t tell all places and go to different town every week all time from one winter to next winter and go to just big towns and work all time for whole year in store window. White people come by window and stand long time and watch me make bow and arrow and some time make tom-tom. First time I go I take Ford touring car and car break down and white boss get pretty mad when I get there second day and not there on time and he give me tickets on railroad and tell me next time you take train and if I am late he get new Indian to sit in store window. I like job like that and meet people and everybody that time call me chief. White man beat Indians this year when have contest cranberry raking Wisconsin Rapids and first time for long time. Next year Indians make things different I bet you and Indians always best rakers and been that way for long time. Cranberry season just about over and only three four more days and all through next week. Butts and other fellows tell everybody about black geese that roost in three at lake and people at Wolcovasky tavern want Indian reporter to tell about bird white fellows call black geese and I go to lake and Indians call them fish ducks and Indian reporter hasn’t seen fish duck for long time. Fish duck is only bird Indian reporter ever know that has web foot like goose and roost in tree like hen. .
